text: Kenneth Jean Georgy Maillard (born 1972) is a Mauritian accountant who is one of the principals of the Belvedere Management group.EXPOSED: Belvedere Management's massive criminal enterprise. David Marchant, OffshoreAlert, 17 March 2015. Retrieved 25 March 2015.CWMFX’s Parent Group Linked to Massive Offshore Ponzi Scheme, Researcher Says. Victor Golovtchenko, Forex Magnates, 24 March 2015. Retrieved 25 March 2015. ==Career== Maillard worked for the offshore department of Arthur Andersen Mauritius and other companies. He is the co-founder and managing director of Belvedere Management Limited and serves as its managing director. Since 2007 he has been a non-executive director of TransAfrika Resources Limited. Maillard is also a director of Fulhold Pharma plc subsidiary Ful Hold Ltd.FULHOLD PHARMA PLC PLACING AND ADMISSION TO TRADING ON THE GXG MAIN QUOTE. Curzon Corporate Finance Ltd, May 2015. Retrieved 9 June 2015. Archived here. ==Professional affiliations== Maillard is a fellow of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants and also an associate member of the Society of Trusts and Estate Planners. ==See also== *Cobus Kellermann *David Dawson Cosgrove ==References== Category:Mauritian businesspeople Category:Accountants Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants Category:1972 births
title: Kenneth Maillard
